mainText:
I learn with emotion the death of Steve Jobs I am deeply saddened and
shocked to learn that my first thoughts are with family and friends I am
wholeheartedly with them and would like to pay tribute to this great
visionary Steve Jobs has been seen has its final presentation yesterday with
the iphone 4s and I will end by saying thank you thank you very much for
doing all dreamed and have allowed the development of innovative
technologies never seen rest in peace ...


 R.I.P
author: Hamid
